scripts.dev:load-tab: bash -c 'while ! nc -z geekofalltrades.local 8000; do sleep 0.5; done; open "http://geekofalltrades.local:8000"; while true; do fswatch -1 __styles __scripts *.php; done'
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n SASS,TS,PHP,LOAD -c magenta,yellow,blue,green, "npm run dev:sass-watch" "npm run dev:ts-watch" "npm run dev:php-server" "npm run dev:load-tab"
scripts.test:py: cd photos && . process_photos/.venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=. pytest process_photos/tests
scripts.document: npm run document:sass && npm run document:ts && npm run document:php
scripts.deploy:stage:code: ssh goat "cd ~/dev.geekofalltrades.org && git pull origin main"
scripts.deploy:stage: npm run deploy:stage:code && npm run deploy:stage:photos
scripts.deploy:prod:snapshot: ssh goat "set -e; TS=\$(date +%F-%H%M%S); SNAP=\$HOME/snapshots/\$TS; SRC=\$HOME/geekofalltrades.org; mkdir -p \"\$SNAP\" && rsync $RSYNC_OPTS --link-dest=\$SRC \$SRC/ \$SNAP/ && ln -sfn \$SNAP \$HOME/snapshots/latest"
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:prod:health && npm run deploy:prod:snapshot && npm run deploy:prod:update && npm run deploy:prod:health && npm run deploy:prod:legacy && npm run deploy:prod:health && echo 'Deploy OK' || (echo 'Deploy FAILED â€” rolling back' && npm run deploy:prod:rollback)
